ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... in my ever-annoying habit of correcting people, EBW is not a better ratio than yak, it is the exact same ratio. ... six note blade and martune rapier. but
ygData.messageBody:
> My suggestion, stick with your old guns, and beg your
> favorite druid to assist you in getting EBWs (7/21)
> One of the best 1hs ratios in the game, better ratio
> than a Yk, except no proc.

in my ever-annoying habit of correcting people, EBW is not a better ratio
than yak, it is the exact same ratio.

>
> What are all the level 40+ people here wielding now?
>
> Harmonic.

six note blade and martune rapier.

but i put in my dues, while at 50 i worked through all the stuff everyone
gets a lot earlier: staff of writhing, silvery war axe, crystalline blade...
i used all that stuff at 50 for a loooong time.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
